name: Black Market Crackdown
description:
Space Merchant Action Game

When the government starts enforcing authoritarian policies, your life as an ordinary citizen comes to an end. Risk your Life Force to become a black market space merchant and deliver contraband to the people who need it the most! Fight off space pirates, who are eager to get their hands on your cargo!

Enjoy this intense procedurally-generated Space Action game!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ludum Dare

Created in 72 hours by Enigma Dragons Jam Squad using Unity. The theme of this event was "Your life is currency".
